sentences.cn: “ 他叫朱尔斯-华莱士, 是个招魂专家.

sentences.en: Could Jules Verne himself have ever imagined anything so magnificent?
sentences.cn: 儒勒凡尔纳本人能够想象这样宏伟的东西 吗 ?

sentences.en: He obviously meant Jules, Lucy, Johnny Fontane and Michael's bodyguard, Albert Neri.
sentences.cn: 他显然指的是裘里斯 、 璐西 、 约翰呢-方檀和迈克尔的保镖亚伯特-奈里.

sentences.en: He turned to Jules. " That was a dumb thing for you to say.
sentences.cn: 他又回头对裘里斯说: “ 你刚才的话实在是一声闷雷.

sentences.en: JULES -- okay now , tell me about the hash bars?
sentences.cn: 朱尔斯:——那么,那些地下酒吧 呢 ?

sentences.en: Jules Pretty: What we’re saying is, look at the system first of all, and then see how you can manipulate it.
sentences.cn: 朱尔斯·普雷蒂说到：“我们想指出的是，首先要根据农业系统的情况才能确定如何熟练操控它。

sentences.en: Jules shrugged. " When I see that I have any future. "
sentences.cn: 裘里斯耸耸肩说: “ 当我看出了我有出头的日子时,我俩就结婚. ”

sentences.en: Jules Verne laid the foundation of modern science fiction.
sentences.cn: 他为现代科幻小说奠定了基础.

sentences.en: JULES We should have shotguns for this kind of deal.
sentences.cn: 朱尔斯:我们必须用鸟枪对付这群小子.

sentences.en: Jules, the story's narrator, is an actress in her late thirties.
sentences.cn: 这个故事的叙述者朱尔斯是个年近不惑的女演员。

sentences.en: Jules: What a difference from the chaos and confusion of two hours ago.
sentences.cn: 朱尔斯: 这和两个钟头前混乱不堪的情况相比,完全不同了.

sentences.en: Linguine with instant pesto – I'm a sucker for noodles and simple ones at that. This is one of my go to meals now … thank you Jules!
sentences.cn: 意大利扁面条和已配置好的香蒜沙司—我对面条和那种简单食物痴迷。这是我现在将要去吃的菜之一…感谢朱尔斯！

sentences.en: Michael turned to Lucy and Jules Segal.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔回头望着璐西和裘里斯-西加尔.

sentences.en: So if Jules doesn't marry you, you can be a rich old ward. "
sentences.cn: 这样,要是裘里斯不娶你, 你也可以当个有钱的未婚老姑娘.

sentences.en: The Jules Rimet Cup was named after the French official who dreamed up the competition.
sentences.cn: 朱尔斯·里梅特杯是以这项竞赛的发起人,一位法国官员的名字命名的.

sentences.en: They all laughed. All except Jules.
sentences.cn: 他们都笑了,除了裘里斯,大伙儿都笑了.

sentences.en: This is one of my go to meals now … thank you Jules!
sentences.cn: 这是我现在将要去吃的菜之一… 感谢朱尔斯！
